tool.name: pdflatex
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the &pdflatex; utility.

cvar.name: PDFLATEXCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to call the &pdflatex; utility.

cvar.name: PDFLATEXCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when calling the &pdflatex; utility. If this is not set, then &cv-link-PDFLATEXCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
env = Environment(PDFLATEX;COMSTR = "Building $TARGET from LaTeX input $SOURCES")

cvar.name: PDFLATEXFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the &pdflatex; utility.
